Sentencas: Long-term degradation effects of combined Cr- and Si-poisoning for the promising intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC) cathode materials La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 (-) (delta) (LSC) and La2NiO4+ (delta) (LNO) were investigated at 700 degrees C in dry and humid atmospheres for subsequent periods of 1000 h by using dc-conductivity relaxation measurements.
Titulo: Long-term stability of the IT-SOFC cathode materials La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 - δ and La2NiO4+ δ against combined chromium and silicon poisoning

Sentencas: Changes in the chemical composition and morphology of the contaminated sample surfaces were studied by X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS), scanning electron microscopy (SEM) with energy and wavelength dispersive X-ray analysis and by atomic force microscopy (AFM).
Titulo: Long-term stability of the IT-SOFC cathode materials La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 - δ and La2NiO4+ δ against combined chromium and silicon poisoning

Sentencas: Upon exposure to dry and humid gas flows containing Cr- and Si-species both materials exhibit a strong decrease of the chemical surface exchange coefficient of oxygen by a factor of 110 and 40 for La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 (-) (delta) and La2NiO4+ delta, respectively, which can be attributed to the formation of Cr-containing crystallites on the degraded sample surfaces.
Titulo: Long-term stability of the IT-SOFC cathode materials La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 - δ and La2NiO4+ δ against combined chromium and silicon poisoning

Sentencas: AFM-measurements reveal faceted crystallites of lateral extensions of up to 2 mu m and heights of up to 500 nm on the surface of La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 (-) (delta).
Titulo: Long-term stability of the IT-SOFC cathode materials La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 - δ and La2NiO4+ δ against combined chromium and silicon poisoning

Sentencas: XPS-analyses confirm the presence of high levels of Cr and Sr in these crystals, indicating the decomposition of the perovskite phase through SrCO4-formation.
Titulo: Long-term stability of the IT-SOFC cathode materials La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 - δ and La2NiO4+ δ against combined chromium and silicon poisoning

Sentencas: The significantly smaller crystallites that are found on the surface of La2NiO4+ (delta) also contain Cr, as well as elevated levels of La.
Titulo: Long-term stability of the IT-SOFC cathode materials La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 - δ and La2NiO4+ δ against combined chromium and silicon poisoning

Sentencas: For both compounds, silicon is found to spread in small patches across the entire sample surface, as determined by EDXS elemental mapping analysis.
Titulo: Long-term stability of the IT-SOFC cathode materials La0.6Sr0.4CoO3 - δ and La2NiO4+ δ against combined chromium and silicon poisoning
